name: Abductee 43
description:
You've been abducted by aliens with attitude. Can you ever get home or will they convince you to stay.

Single player first person nonviolent PC game. Emphasis on story and humor not on intense action.  -  Demo level.

No ads. No in game purchases.

W-A-S-D keys and mouse to control. Esc key for menu.

(The screenshots are from a level in the full game that is not in the demo.)

A game made in Unity by ShivaFooL, a solo developer in New Mexico.
